picks.title: Häagen-Dazs Pralines and Cream
picks.comment: Honestly, it's so good that if someone gave me two tubs of this ice cream and I didn't have a freezer, I'd eat both on the spot. And regret not having more.

picks.title: Häagen-Dazs Cookies and Cream
picks.comment: The main difference between this and Pralines and Cream is that I would rather wait until it melts and drink it as a Oreo/Black & White/Cookies and Cream milkshake.

picks.title: Häagen-Dazs Strawberry Cheesecake
picks.comment: I swear I don't work for Häagen-Dazs, their vanilla-based ice cream is just so delicious. Add strawberries and cheesecake? Too good.

picks.title: Häagen-Dazs Dulce de Leche
picks.comment: Everything about this sings luxury, and the taste lives up to it. Well done marketing department.

picks.title: Mango Sorbet
picks.comment: The best one I have ever tasted was made by a small ice cream shop in Lille. You know it's good when you devour it even when it's freezing outside.
